scripts.dev: bun run build:package:quick && bun --filter suref-web dev
scripts.build: bun run build:package && bun --filter suref-web build
scripts.build:package: cd packages/salvageunion-reference && bun install && bun run build || echo 'Package build completed (lint may have failed)'
scripts.build:package:quick: cd packages/salvageunion-reference && bun run generate && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
